text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump @HHSGov "...Trump ...proposed a 10 % cut to HHS’s budget that amounts to billions of $'s....in that context, $100k is a pittance....[He] is actively working to dismantle HHS & other...agencies that respond to outbreaks like the coronavirus while...posturing as their generous benefactor."
